messageTemplate:
Hi! I'm looking for blank [ITEM] for embroidery ‚Äî personalized gift/souvenir business. Can I ask:
(1) What's your price per piece for [quantity]?
(2) What's your minimum order?
(3) Do you ship to [city/province]?
(4) What materials/sizes are available?
